618.60 PERMIT FEE.

The fee for a dangerous animal permit application shall be as set forth in Appendix A of Chapter 1464 of the Codified Ordinances. The total fee is nonrefundable. Such fee shall be payable to the City at the time of filing the permit application. Accretions by natural birth shall not require additional permits during the period of a valid permit.

(Ord. 03-42. Passed 8-21-03.)
